summary: Applies a transpose operation that swaps the rows and columns of an image, effectively rotating it 90 degrees followed by a horizontal flip. The transform also adjusts associated bounding boxes and keypoints to match the new dimensions, preserving channel order. It can be applied probabilistically based on a given probability parameter.
business_intent: Enables random image and annotation transposition as a data augmentation technique to increase dataset diversity and improve model robustness to orientation changes.
